Madison.East Towne Mall:
East Towne Mall is a shopping mall located on the northeast side of Madison, Wisconsin.


== History ==
The mall opened for business October 14, 1971 with a small ribbon cutting ceremony, a year after West Towne Mall, on the west side of Madison. At the time it was constructed, East Towne was Madison's largest enclosed mall, and had four large anchor stores, Sears, J. C. Penney, H. C. Prange Co., and Gimbel's.
